name: Tetris Tower (Fat Alien Cat)
description:
Tetris Tower is a game where you use the tetris peices and platforming to build a tower, the catch is when you jump from the ground you place the block plus there is that pesky gravity to content with!

 Build as quickly as you can and reach the finish line!

It interprates the Roll of the Dice theme as using random elements to generate the blocks which will come next.

Move/jump - WASD

Rotate Clockwise -  >

Rotate Anti-clockwise - <

Menu - P

Let us know what your best times are in the comment!
